meanings.definition: To transport or convey by automobile.
meanings.sent1: She automobiled her friends to the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: He automobiled his family to the airport for their vacation.
meanings.sent3: The cat automobiled the mouse across the room in a toy car.
meanings.sent4: The idea automobiled through her mind, picking up speed.
meanings.sent5: The package was automobiled to its destination in record time.

meanings.definition: Equipped with or operated by an automobile.
meanings.sent1: The automobiled vehicle sped down the highway.
meanings.sent2: The automobiled car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The automobiled bus honked loudly as it stopped at the corner.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened at the sight of the automobiled truck.
meanings.sent5: The automobiled taxi stood out among the other vehicles.
